headline.main: SESSION HERE BACKS PEPPER RESOLUTION; Free World Congress Calls for Peace Action by Senate

lead_paragraph: The Free World Congress, arranged by the Free World Association, in which Mrs. J. Borden Harriman is active, closed a three-day session at the Hotel McAlpin by adopting yesterday a resolution offered by Orson Welles, dramatist, endorsing the amendment of Senator Claude R. Pepper to the Connally resolution now before the Senate.
abstract: Free World Cong backs Pepper amendment
